metadata.dcterms:title: Evaluation of an Online Peer Support Network for Parents of Children with a Heart or Liver Transplant
metadata.dcterms:creator: West, Lori
Nicholas, David
Dodd, Bernadette
Gilmour, Susan
Urschel, Simon
Yap, Jason
McClure, Michelle
Roberts, Cheri
metadata.dcterms:description: This study will initiate and evaluate a 6 month online peer support network for parents of a child with a heart (HTx) or liver transplant (LTx). Specifically, study objectives comprise exploration of: (1) the effectiveness of an online network for caregiving parents of children with HTx or LTx; (2) parents' experiences and perceptions of the network; (3) the benefits/limitations of online technology for peer interaction; and (4) the means by which parents convey support within this online context.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
peer group
social support
parents
pediatrics
transplant recipients
social media
mixed methods studies
heart transplantation
liver transplantation
online support
metadata.dcterms:type: Interview data; Focus group data; Survey data; Qualitative data; Clinical data
metadata.dcterms:source: The Multidimensional Support Scale (DSS); Meaning of Illness Questionnaire (MIQ); Coping Health Inventory for Parents;
metadata.dcterms:rights: Data collected will not become part of a data repository or be involved in the creation of a research database at a future date.
